TopicTitle: Spawn Menu ships spawn around my vessel.

Articles.Content:
As stated in the title, spawn menu ships spawn around my vessel whenever I launch. It's quite funny for a bit but it would sometimes spawn in front of my vessel and blow it up. The majority of the time it is the little satellite  with the Kerbal on it.

 

KSP Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

Operating System: Windows 11

CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600x

GPU: RTX 3060ti

Steps to replicate: Unsure how

Mods: None

Workarounds: Exit to Main Menu.

Edited March 3, 2023 by Clarksuckslmao
